title: Revlon Curl Collection Heated Styling Brush
description: Introducing the all new Revlon curl collection ceramic heated styling brush. Styling brush is perfect for adding volume, smoothing and creating gorgeous curls and waves. The heated styling brush comes with heat resistant bristles that are cool to the touch, are thinner and shorter which allows for a better grip and non slip styling. Feature: On indicator light, cool tip, hanging ring, heat resistant glove included and worldwide dual voltage.
